title: Something my therapist said: it doesn’t matter how often abuse happens, even once is enough to leave lifelong trauma.

author: thecourageofstars
text:
This comment has been removed for misinformation. There is more than enough research to indicate that a single event can indeed be traumatic, and repeated trauma is not the only form of trauma.

This invalidating and diminishing language is also completely unacceptable in a support group for abuse victims, as is the gatekeeping. We also do NOT tolerate transphobia here. You've been given a permanent ban.

author: lemonagain8619
text:
Transphobia AND complete bullshit in one comment?
“troonies” don’t want you to not be hetero. Trans women are women, and trans men are men. This is proven by science. If you have genital preferences, literally no one cares, that’s perfectly fine. You’re not obligated to date a single person on this planet, but if you date them because you believe them to be their AGAB you’re transphobic. Fuck off this subreddit, we don’t welcome assholes of your kind here.
